level.heading: Enforcement.
level.text: Any feepayer who fails to file a return or pay the ballpark fee due as required by § 47-2755 [§ 47-2762] shall be subject to the same enforcement provisions and administrative provisions applicable to the ballpark fee as provided in Chapter 18, Chapter 41, Chapter 42 (except §§ 47-4211(b)(1)(B), 47-4214, and 47-4215), and Chapter 43 of this title.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-191 substituted "of this title" for " of this title " following "Chapter 43".

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 12 of Finance and Revenue Technical Amendments Second Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-585, December 28, 2006, 54 DCR 340).
